dict.acceptation: 血统，家族；性格，脾气；语气；一段音乐；

不懈；受到强大的压力；拉紧，紧绷；

sent.orig: Plastic strain mechanism of magnesium alloy is reviewed plastic strain mechanism of ZK60 at various temperature.
sent.trans: 综述了镁合金的几种塑性变形机制，并介绍了ZK60合金在不同温度下的变形机制。

sent.orig: Strain and strain rate imaging, a promising and relatively new non-invasive method of assessing myocardial function.
sent.trans: 应变应变率成像是新近发展起来的一种无创性定量评价心肌功能的超声技术。

sent.orig: How sell the metal forms will be governed by the strain-hardening exponent and average strain ratio.
sent.trans: 如何选模由加工硬化指数和平均应变比例所决定。

sent.orig: Aspergillus niger 3866 is confirmed the highly enzyme activity producing strain by screening strain.
sent.trans: 通过菌株筛选，确定了黑曲霉3866为糖苷转化酶高产菌株。

sent.orig: The analysis covers plane strain, plane stress and anti-plane strain shear cases.
sent.trans: 分析包括了平面应变、面应力和出平面应变剪切三种情况。
